SUBJECT: Eligibility Certification
TO: RUS Water and Environmental Programs Staff.
AVAILABILITY: This Bulletin is available on the Internet at http://www.rurdev.usda.gov/RDU_Bulletins_Water_and_Environmental.html
PURPOSE: This bulletin is issued to outline the eligibility requirements for commercial credit and outstanding judgments.

certification_section_title: Certification for commercial credit and outstanding judgments
certification_statement: The undersigned certifies, to the best of their knowledge and belief, that:
certification_point_1: The organization is unable to finance the proposed project from its own resources or through commercial credit at reasonable rates and terms.
certification_point_2: No outstanding judgment has been obtained and recorded by the United States of America in a Federal Court (other than in the United States Tax Court).
